info.title: SystemLink Systems State Service
info.description: API for creating and storing systems states.

parameters.name: stateId
parameters.description: The id of the state for which to fetch the edit history.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: How many entries to skip in the result when paging.

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: How many entries to return in the result.

200.description: The history of the given state.

get.summary: Get state at a specific version

parameters.name: stateId
parameters.description: The id of the state for which to fetch a specific version.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The specific version of the state.

200.description: The state at the specified version.

post.summary: Revert the state history version to the provided version.

requestBody.description: Instance of NationalInstruments.SystemsStateService.Model.API.RevertStateRequest which contains the id of the state to be reverted and the specific version to revert to.

parameters.name: Skip
parameters.description:
How many files to skip in the result when paging.
For example, a list of 100 files with a skip value of 50 and a take value of 25 will return entries 51 through 75.

parameters.name: Take
parameters.description:
How many files to return in the result, or 0 to use a default defined by the service.
For example, a list of 100 files with a skip value of 50 and a take value of 25 will return entries 51 through 75.

parameters.name: Workspace
parameters.description: The workspace id of the states.

parameters.name: Architecture
parameters.description:
All the states that are compatible with the requested architecture will be returned.
The value ANY provides the states that are generic and not specific to any architecture.
For example, if the architecture is X64, all states that have that architecture as well as those that have ANY will be returned.

parameters.name: Distribution
parameters.description:
All the states that are compatible with the requested distribution will be returned.
The value ANY provides the states that are generic and not specific to any distribution.
For example, if the distribution is NI_LINUXRT, all states that have that distribution as well as those that have ANY will be returned.

requestBody.description: An instance of NationalInstruments.SystemsStateService.Model.API.StateRequest which contains information about the state to be created.
An instance of NationalInstruments.SystemsStateService.Model.API.ExportStateRequest which contains identifying information on the state to export.

200.description: The exported state as a file.

post.summary: Generate state export of a system

requestBody.description: An instance of NationalInstruments.SystemsStateService.Model.API.ExportStateFromSystemRequest which contains the system id from which to export the state.

200.description: The exported state of the system as a file.

parameters.name: stateId
parameters.description: The id of the state that is to be fetched.

200.description: The state of the given id

parameters.name: stateId
parameters.description: The id of the state to be updated.

requestBody.description: A dictionary which contains key-value pairs as such: the key is the state property to be updated (e.g. "name") and the value is the new/updated value of the property (e.g. "A nice state")

parameters.name: stateId
parameters.description: The id of the state to be deleted.

Id.description: Gets or sets the id of the state that is to have its content replaced.

ChangeDescription.description: Gets or sets the description for this change.

File.description: Gets or sets the state file (.sls).

Name.description: Gets or sets the name of the state. Required.

Description.description: Gets or sets the description of the state.

Distribution.description: Gets or sets the distribution supported by the state. Required.

Architecture.description: Gets or sets the architecture supported by the state. Required.

Properties.description:
Gets or sets the custom properties for a state.
This should be serialized in a json string.

Workspace.description: Gets or sets the ID of the workspace. This property is available starting with version 3 of the createOrUpdateStates operation.

File.description: Gets or sets the state file (.sls).

requestBody.description: A list of state ids for the states that are to be deleted.

inline.description: Gets or sets whether to return the state data inline or as an attachment. When the inline is true, the Content-Disposition header is set to 'inline'. When the inline is not specified or is false, the state contents are handled as a download. The Content-Disposition header is set to 'attachment' and the MIME type is set to text/x-yaml; charset=UTF-8.

Gets or sets whether to return the state data inline or as an attachment. When the inline is true, the Content-Disposition header is set to 'inline'. When the inline is not specified or is false, the state contents are handled as a download. The Content-Disposition header is set to 'attachment' and the MIME type is set to text/x-yaml; charset=UTF-8.

name.description: Gets or sets name of the feed.

url.description: Gets or sets the url for the repository.

enabled.description: Gets or sets whether the feed is enabled or not.

compressed.description: Gets or sets whether the feed is compressed or not.

Feed.description: Model for object defining a feed, which contains the name, url, and Booleans for whether the feed is enabled and compressed.

name.description: Gets or sets name of the package.

version.description: Gets or sets version of the package.

installRecommends.description: Gets or sets a boolean variable whose value controls the installation of the recommended packages. This property is available starting with version 2 of the getStates and createOrUpdateStates operations.

Package.description: Model for object defining a package containing the name and version.

id.description: Gets or sets the ID of the state.

version.description: Gets or sets the version of the state.

totalCount.description: Gets or sets total count of states.

StateDescriptionListResponse.description: Model for the response containing a list of state metadata.

totalCount.description: Gets or sets total number of versions of a state.

StateHistoryResponse.description: Model for the history of a state.

stateID.description: Gets or sets the ID of the state.

stateVersion.description: Gets or sets the version of the state. The latest package/feed set of the state will be used if the version is not specified.

id.description: Gets or sets the ID of the state.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the state.

description.description: Gets or sets the description of the state.

distribution.description: Gets or sets supported distribution by a state.

architecture.description: Gets or sets supported architecture by a state.

properties.description: Gets or sets the custom properties for a state.

createdTimestamp.description: Gets or sets ISO-8601 formatted timestamp specifying the state creation date.

lastUpdatedTimestamp.description: Gets or sets ISO-8601 formatted timestamp specifying the last date that the state was updated.

workspace.description: Gets or sets the ID of the workspace. This property is available starting with version 3 of the getStates operation.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the state.

description.description: Gets or sets the description of the state.

distribution.description: Gets or sets the distribution supported by a state.

architecture.description: Gets or sets the architecture supported by a state.

properties.description: Gets or sets the custom properties for a state.

workspace.description: Gets or sets the ID of the workspace. This property is available starting with version 3 of the createOrUpdateStates operation.

id.description: Gets or sets the ID of the state.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the state.

description.description: Gets or sets the description of the state.

distribution.description: Gets or sets supported distribution by a state.

architecture.description: Gets or sets supported architecture by a state.

properties.description: Gets or sets the custom properties for a state.

createdTimestamp.description: Gets or sets ISO-8601 formatted timestamp specifying the state creation date.

lastUpdatedTimestamp.description: Gets or sets ISO-8601 formatted timestamp specifying the last date that the state has been updated.

containsExtraOperations.description: Gets or sets whether the state contains extra operations in addition to feeds and packages.

workspace.description: Gets or sets the ID of the workspace. This property is available starting with version 3 of the getStates operation.

version.description: Gets or sets the version of the state

description.description: Gets or sets the description of this specific change.

createdTimestamp.description: Gets or sets ISO-8601 formatted timestamp specifying the state version creation date.

userId.description: Gets or sets the user Id of the user who created the state version

StateVersion.description: Model for a given version of a state.

name.description: Gets or sets name of the system image.

version.description: Gets or sets version of the system image.

SystemImage.description: Model for object defining a system image containing the name and version.
